section1.partner1: <0>P4 Sp. z o.o.</0>, owned by the French iliad Group, is a telecommunications operator with over 15 million customers. The company provides mobile telephony services, as well as mobile and fixed-line internet access to individual and business customers on a contract and pre-paid basis under the umbrella brand PLAY. Play provides services, available to over 99% of the population, through its extensive, modern and cost-effective 2G/3G/4G LTE/5G telecommunications network, as well as on the basis of long-term domestic roaming agreements. PLAY's offer also includes the PLAY NOW television service.
